properties.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 4:22AM AKST until February 9 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult
travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches
are expected with localized amounts up to 14 inches.

* WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys.

* WHEN...3 AM Saturday to 6 AM Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall is expected
southwest of Galena. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow reducing the
visibility to one half mile or less at times. Cold wind chills
as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as
10 minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe
winter weather conditions are expected. This will make travel
very difficult or impossible.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 6 AM AKST SUNDAY
